scripts.build: tsc --build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/types' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/abis' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/utils' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/profiles' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/core' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/rpc' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/pathfinder' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/transfers' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/sdk' build && bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/runner' build
scripts.build:analyze: bun run build:analyze:types && bun run build:analyze:abis && bun run build:analyze:utils && bun run build:analyze:profiles && bun run build:analyze:core && bun run build:analyze:rpc && bun run build:analyze:pathfinder && bun run build:analyze:transfers && bun run build:analyze:sdk && bun run build:analyze:runner
scripts.dev: bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/utils' dev & bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/core' dev & bun run --filter '@circles-sdk-v2/rpc' dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/dist packages/*/node_modules node_modules packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
